name: Welcome to Levy
description:
Levy was a sleepy one stop town before the Cataclysm turned the nearby city of Savannah into a wasteland. Now the survivors are trapped between the alien world that has replaced the city and the constant war and famine of the collapsing society outside. This is the story of the few who still remain in the town of Levy.

Features


  • 11 unique endings
  • Over 680 adult CGs
  • Branching story line
  • Grim apocalyptic setting
  • HD Art pack available with all CGs
